contentList.content: You ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">disadvantage</LSTag> from making <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag> within [1]. You also gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks.</LSTag>.

As a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>, you can enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="UA_FightingStyle_DEFENSIVE_STANCE">defensive stance</LSTag> until your next turn. While in this stance, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class increases</LSTag> by 1 and you gain an extra <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.

Until the start of your next turn, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain an extra <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.

While you are not wearing heavy armor or wielding a shield, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> increases by 1, your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [1], and your jump distance increases by 50%.
When an enemy hits an ally within [1], reduce the damage by 1d10 + Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You must be able to see the attacker.
Deal an additional 2 damage with <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">thrown</LSTag> weapons.
You gain one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">superiority die</LSTag> and learn the Riposte maneuver from the Battle Master subclass.

You learn the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Shillelagh">Shillelagh</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Guidance">Guidance</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">spellcasting ability</LSTag> for them.

You learn the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SacredFlame">Sacred Flame</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Guidance">Guidance</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">spellcasting ability</LSTag> for them.
